title: THE BEST GAME EVER!!!!
text: ok, so I’ve been playing subway surfers for a long time now,(3-4 years) and I’ve never been sick of it. the only thing is that I thought tricky was free?? she was before, and I believe she should be for starter players that aren’t a boy , or don’t like the jake avatar. subway surfers should make tricky free again to make all players feel comfortable with their avatar. but it doesn’t really bother me because I saved up my coins to buy my dream avatar, tagbot. subway surfers, please make tricky free again!!! anyway, I love the themes that subway surfers makes!! they make so many themes based around so many things!(new York city, ALL the holidays , Chinese new year, egypt and soooo many more!) the theme I’m in currently is the fantasy one, and I love it!! I also love how they make updates currently! to end this long review, I just wanna say that subway surfers is the best. thanks for reading this and have an amazing day/night! bye!!<3333

title: Please Read!!
text: So I got this game out of curiosity. It looked kinda dorky. I downloaded it, started playing it, and I have to admit, it might be my new favorite game. I have only one suggestion to make it BETTER, if that’s even possible!!’😜 So heat me out. When you play the game, it opens up a tab thingy that asks for your age. I put it in and continued. As soon as I opened the tutorial, it made me play as Charlie. Since I’m a girl, I naturally wanted to play as a girl character, right? So I went over to the character panel and tried to switch around my character. I quickly realized that you either have to pay 30,000 coins, which is extremely hard to get, or collect three beanies in mystery boxes. I opened TEN since then and none of them had a beanie! I was like, what?! So my suggestion is that after you put in your age, you put in your gender as well. Sorry for the long story, and please read this! Great game overall!!

Wonderful app! If you are looking for an app for all ages, here it is. If you are looking for a fun app, here it is! If you are looking for a challenging game, here it is! If you are looking for a terrible game...it’s not here. I just love this app! It is so kid friendly and adult friendly because you can’t interact with anyone unless you have Facebook, so it’s especially safe for young kids! This game has many challenges and many skins that you need to unlock, which makes it a bit challenging. I love the fact that there are high scores from all over the world, and that each week you have a chance to read gold! This game does have ads, but not the video type, which I think is amazing, because now I don’t have to turn off my WiFi! Speaking of which...the fact that you don’t need WiFi makes it even better for a road trip! I’ve played this countless times while on my way to California. This app is definitely 12/10! : D

title: Awesome!
text:
This game is very cool! it isn’t boring and it doesn’t really  need any internet to play, though it sometimes glitches, like when I was getting my sandwiches (tickets to collect in events) and the max was 10 but I got 24 ( it was 24/10 sandwiches collected) so that’s an annoyance for me, but it’s not really my fault! 
In the game there are “glitches” and some people that hack in to get a high score or to just get coins or get something from the event and thats just really annoying to me.
Anyways you get the options to buy characters or boards and you also collect keys in the middle of your run so it can help you buy stuff too if you don’t have enough coins! 
There are multiple events, and right now I’m playing the 10th years old event with super runner yutani and it never gets boring, the map changes a lot and yeah, it’s really cool and impossible to be boring and I could play it all day. 👏🏻😘

title: Grew up with this game
text: I grew up with this game. I played it on my Kindle when was three and I just downloaded it again a week or two ago. It’s just as amazing and addictive as it used to be. I also love the fact that it would increase reaction time, since the point of the game is dodging and jumping over things while collecting coins. The only missing is that although I love the characters, and I love that they're in keeping with the storyline of a late teens graffiti artist running from the police, it would be cool to have a bubblegum princess type character, for those of us who are more feminine. Even just a girl with long hair that’s not dyed, converse, high waisted jeans or jean shorts, and a fitted tee would be great, to fit in with the more normal characters. It would also be cool to have a girl with blond hair that’s curly, and a ballgown on just makes her look kind of like a fairy godmother, and maybe some wings, which would fit into the more absurd characters.

title: Good, but a few problems.
text: This game is great and I played it almost every day, I get a lot of high scores and get a lot of coins to unlock a different character, but the problem is the highest scores, whenever I get a high score, once I lose it it becomes much of a rage town, and some people can get angry when losing their score, especially when getting very far. maybe try making other changes like “ chasing boosts” where you can change how fast the chaser (i’m not sure what he is called) and you can make him slower, or maybe make the train speed slower, and make boosts a little bit more useful (The jump boots sometimes get me killed because of how high I jump) so maybe try making the jump boots only able to jump across trains or something, besides a lot of the problems that making people lose their score, this is very good and much better playing it every day then just playing the same game every day. Your game is great.

title: The new update is a downgrade
text: So I have recently started playing this game again in quarantine and I have had many issues with the game. The day after I redownloaded it and already played it it would not load. I would leave it for ten minutes and it would still not load. I emailed the company and they never got back to me. It has been about two months. Another problem is that the new update (in my opinion) has made the game look very old and childish. It looks like it is from the 90s. I highly dislike the new style of the game. I also purchased double coins many years ago and now I cannot get it back even when I restore my purchase. I’m not going to waste my time emailing the company because I will not get an answer. The items in the game are also way too expensive. It took me almost 3 weeks of playing for about 45 minutes a day to get the hoverboard that I wanted. I will change my rating if the company will take this review into consideration and realize that many people are not a fan of the new update and other features, especially all the bugs that the new update has.

title: Could you please stop with the fake reviews?
text:
The main thing I have to say is that I love this game Sybo! 
Second thing is, it's SO ADDICTING
And possibly the last thing is that why is everyone hating this? It's an endless runner game made in 2012. So it may not be good. (no offense sybo, I love this!) And no, I'm not getting paid to say this, it's an OPINION!!! People say it's bad because of the design (that's the only one I could find I think:/ ) because it looks shabby. Just because they don't like it. Just because people can't enjoy things. And I'm starting to think they’re fake so stop with the false news!! (Sorry if this paragraph is not very like the title or sounds like a child ranting on about other people’s opinions. This text was not supposed to offend anyone and I explain things terribly. All I want is for people to respect Sybo’s work on this game that became so popular. Well, I'm outta here to hop back in the game, bye!

title: Thanks for reading if you do read it
text: I have to admit, Subway Surfers is literally the only thing I play or do next to social media. It’s so addicting, which is both bad and good. I usually get good scores, and once I got an amazing score. It was in the millions. I had about 2,000 coins collected. Then my phone died and I was so angry. But you can’t just get angry, just try again. I didn’t give up on my game just because my phone died. So if you play this game, you have to have dedicated time. I had it a few years ago and just got it back. And I enjoy it so much. Plus I don’t have Instagram or Snapchat so whenever my friends are on it I just bust out my subway surfers. It’s a good game if you want to pass time. There are different challenges you can complete for keys that get you outfits for other characters. So if your in the car and it’s like a 12 hour drive, subways surfers is a good way to pass the time. (I play it for hours-no joke) anyway, I encourage anyone and everyone to get this app.

title: Facebook issue
text: I love this game so much, but everytime I try to connect to Facebook it says “Can’t conmect to Facebook right now.” I had this game last year and I was connected but I had deleted it due to not playing it as much anymore. I downloaded it again just to find it wont let me connect. I’ve tried connecting with wifi and without and it wont work. I tried deleting both Facebook and Subway Surfers and re downloaded it but to no avail. I tried logging out of FB and logging back in and it still wont connect. Theres no option in iOS settings for FB that let me log in, and it is very frustrating because I would love to see my friends’ scores. I have a few other games that let me connect to FB with no problem. I’m not sure if anyone else has this problem because everytime I google it, the last people who complained about this wrote it in 2013. Great game, but I wish I could connect.

title: I have mixed feelings.

I was playing the Event where you can earn super runner fresh if you complete all 5 stages, and i got to about stage three, I believe. I have the hoverboard. title: Turn it back into what it used to be
text: The game is one of the best games on the App Store that you can find. As a younger kid I play subway surfers on my iPad all the time and it was awesome. That was before all the seasons. Back then there were just seasons for holidays and I liked it that way. I wish you could take out all those seasons and keep the default music the default map and just change it when it’s a holiday for example, Valentine’s Day for St. Patrick’s Day or Christmas. It’s still a very good game, but I just wish I could go back to what it was before. It is just so much simpler and personally, for me better. I’m not saying you have to take out all the seasons, but maybe make an option where you don’t participate in the season’s like you can change the music of the beatbox. Still, it’s such a great game and super fun to play and thrilling whenever you get a new high score but that’s the one thing I think that needs improvement.

title: What?!?!

title: Subway surfers
text: I think the app needed an update and I really don’t mind the new update but I don’t like how they changed the season hunt back to 10 because you try hard to get 10 things and you just get 1000 coins for it, I get 1000 coins from a run in like 3 minutes so the time spend looking for those things should get you better prizes, I don’t find the characters to be that expensive because I play the game a lot so I get that money In like 3 days but I think the outfits of the people you have to collect stuff for should give you an option to buy it, like getting fresh wasn’t hard but then I gotta collect stuff for all his outfits too, I think the outfits for those kinds of people should have an opinion to buy it for somewhere around 60,000 coins so it’s not to easy but not impossible, but it is a fun game to play when you’re bored and want something to do, it definitely keeps me occupied, it’s a good game so that’s all I have to say, have a good day 👍🏽

title: Great anniversary update!
text:
Love the new update. Loads faster now! Took some time to get used to the new changes but they are welcomed. A lot of content on screen but it’s not overbearing. I see a lot of reviews about lagging. Get a newer device. I’m using an iPhone 11 and I’m not experiencing any of the issues mentioned. Had those issues a few months ago when I was still holding on to my iPhone 6. Love those reviews about the game looking like a child designed it. Well the age rating is 9+. You definitely hit the mark. Thank you!

A suggestion for your consideration please. In the Wordy Weekend, after completing our character’s name, instead of having to crash and go back to main menu to change characters, can we get a automatic pause menu with the option to continue with that character or switch to the next character then resume with the explosion like crashing with a board? Please!?? Wow that was long.

title: childhood
text: right here is a great game for boring car rides. It doesn’t have many ads and it is good for younger kids. This is pretty addictive ngl, and it isn’t money hungry. you are trying to avoid crashing into cars while a cop chasing you. it isn’t one of those clickbait games that have like 500 ads and end up being fake, it is what it says. You always want to beat your high score and it was really fun trying to see if your friends can beat your score. It also has a ton of stuff that you can buy with coins like a new board or skin AND YOU DONT HAVE TO SPEND MONEY TO GET THEM! You can get them by just playing a lot! You can also collect words to spell something so you can get extra coins. There are also challenges that give you MORE COINS. You don’t have to go for your mom’s credit card for coins! This was my childhood and I played it all the time... GREAT GAME. I recommend this game. You are missing out on this game.

title: Love this game, could be improved
text: I absolutely love this game!! I recently started playing a lot more because it is a very good distraction. However, the new alien theme need some improvement. First, when I am on the subways with sneakers, it ends up killing me because of the sealing. When ultimately, I have no choice but to jump. It’s practically a die or die situation. Second, there are things in the middle of the tracks which makes it confusing because I can’t exactly see when a subway is coming. Third, when I get a pogo stick, sometimes it glitches and I end up being half on the roof and half off. Finally, sometimes when sneakers or magnets pop up on the tracks, I’ll bypass them and they give me it anyway. I suggest that maybe you could do something where we could choose the theme we would like to use (I really like the Tokyo one) I feel like it would be more beneficial for people who play better in other settings.

title: I have some suggestions
text: Hello! I’m going to start off with saying that I absolutely love subway surfers and that I’ve been playing it ever since I was very young. Even though the game is amazing I do have some suggestions that might make the game even better. First one, I think it would be pretty cool if you could customize your own character to go on runs with. Maybe you could save up your coins for clothes or accessories. I’m not really sure but maybe it could make the game a bit more..uhhhmm.. interesting? The choice is really up to you! Next suggestion, I also think it would be nice if you had a pet to go on the run with you. I was thinking a dog or cat, maybe even a tiger! Also if you did have a pet on the run with you a certain pet could give you a certain power up. Thank you so much for reading this review! Once again your game is amazing and I bet you guys worked very hard to create it. Thanks!💛💛😁

title: Marginalizes BIPOC Characters
text: The game is riveting and entertaining. But one problem I have concerns the difficulty in accessing Black, Indigenous, and People of Color characters. They are there, but inaccessible. The first character everyone has to play with is a white boy / man. The next character that becomes available is a white girl / woman, after collecting three red hats, which are given generously without even trying. Another white character only costs 7,000 coins. I would like to play with Black characters. But I need to collect 50 stereos to access the Black character Fresh. The stereos are not easy to come by - they are sometimes awarded for achieving milestones or buying mystery boxes. The Black character Ella costs 150,000 coins. Prince K costs 980,000 coins. This structure makes it hard to access the BIPOC characters. The leaderboards may reflect this problem, as many people may play with white characters just because they are available. The game is often uncomfortable to me for this reason, and I previously deleted the app. If you really want to embrace racial and cultural diversity, make BIPOC characters accessible to players.

title: Recommend this game, just a few things though...
text:
Great and super fun and addicting game, 
But it’s super annoying how the game is putting skins for actual money. I appreciate how they’re making those expensive deals in the shop for coins and keys. Another thing, I think the upgrades for the power ups are very annoying and a bit over priced. It’s also very annoying using the super shoes and then you uncontrollably fall/jump into the wall arc thingies.

One thing, though. I had played the game for hours trying to get 100,000 coins for one of the deals, and everything was incredibly laggy the night when I finally got enough to buy it. I go into the store through all of the lag, click the buy button, and then when nothing happens for a minute, I close the game, reopen it, and all my coins are gone, and i didn’t even get the avatar, board, nothing. I’m super frustrated right now and trying to earn back my coins.

title: i love this game but....

title: OMG I love it!!!!😍😍😍😍😍😍
text: Me and my sis downloaded this game a few days ago and it’s awesome!!!  I can’t stop playing this game because it’s so good. Some people talk about how bad it is but in my opinion it’s such a good game! There’s just one problem tho.... When Santa Claus caught me I didn’t want to wait or watch an ad so it said it would just take away 1 key so I meant to spend 1 key but then it went from 22 keys to 7 keys!!! It just bothers me that it did that I’m sorry if I’m being rude I don’t want to be mean it just annoys me that it did that. Anyways, this is such a good game I think whoever’s reading this should download this game. It’s so fun that I’ve been playing this for hours....⏱⏱⏱⏱😂😂😂😂😂😂🤣🤣🤣🤣I just suggest when Santa Claus catches you don’t spend your keys because it might take away almost all your keys..... I’m gonna give this a 5 out of 5 stars cuz this game is so good. I give a thanks to this company for making thisss 😉😉😉😉😉😉😉

title: Really fun game, just needs a few changes.
text: Subway surfers is one of the best games I ever played. I love the maps + characters and the way they made it is so creative. Though… there is one really annoying problem in a middle of a run sometimes you watch a add it doesn’t show anything it’s just black and so you have to do then run all over again. Second problem sometimes the screen freeze’s so that makes you have to do it all over again. LAST PROBLEM though I’m kinda addicted to this game this is a problem I personally hate all you have to do is click something and if you have enough you just get that thing WITH NO SECOND WARNING because sometimes I click on stuff by accident like I did today I clicked on a character I really didn’t want but I didn’t know I had enough keys (80 keys) so I clicked on it just wanting to know the price of keys and with no second warning I just got the character it was so upsetting I wasted 80 keys on something I didn’t want. :(

title: Classic game since Temple Run.
text:
I’ve been playing this game since high school back when all I had was my mom’s giant iPad. It’s easy for anyone to pick up and play, and incredibly fun. I also like that unlike Temple Run, it doesn’t go based off of your phone’s movements so I can play in the comfort of my bed without having to worry about my character only running on one side of the screen.

I think in terms of the rewards you get, it can be pretty confusing because there’s so many different tabs and gifts to open and I wasn’t sure what I got from doing what, but no real complaints about that since we’re getting rewarded. Just wish we could claim rewards from one tab as opposed to five different other tabs. Makes the main menu look too chaotic with all the numbered notifications.

Other than that, still a great game. Glad it’s still around.

title: I LOVE THIS GAME!!!!
text: So first of all let’s just point out the fact that I have had this app on all my devices for the past 6 years. It is that great! My little sisters originally got this app and that’s why I got the app. We always enjoy playing it together. No matter how old you are this game grows with you. I love the fact that the location of where the game takes place always changes and you get to observe different characteristics of each different place. My cousin introduced me to this app and I immediately fell in love. It is absolutely addicting! I also enjoy this game rather than others is because you can earn coins a lot quicker than other apps. On subway surf you can earn 1000 coins in two runs from videos and bonus gifts. While in other games it could take you two days to two weeks to earn that much. I would 100% recommend this to everyone and this is definitely a great add!!!

title: A suggestion for your game
text: I love this game now more than I have in the past. This is a game that I will never delete off my phone . I have played for so long I have accumulated quite a lot of characters and I assume anybody who has played as long as I have would also have lots of character's and that’s where my suggestion comes in. I would like to see a way to have a random surfer. I have so many that sometimes I use just one because I don’t feel like switching every time. If there was an option to make the surfer one random surfer out of all the ones u have I think it would be a great addition to the game. While your at it might as well do the same thing for the boards. Being able to play with all your characters in all different types of outfits I think would be quite fun. Hope u take the suggestion. Still a great game though

title: A Review of Everything In This Game
text:
So I love this game. 1: It is so addicting. 2: There are many challenges. 3: You can watch ads for keys and mystery boxes for a long time. And they are not those long ads! They’re about 30 seconds each. 4: There are so many characters and they are always adding new ones! I also love the new locations for the game which adds challenges and a new character!
But there are also a bad thing about this game. It resets. Why? I want to figure that out. I just don’t know. It resets all of my stuff, and it goes back down to as if I have just downloaded it, which I obviously haven’t. I have been playing this game for years, since 5th grade! (I’m way older now) It has never done this, only a couple of months ago before and it just did it yesterday. I’m just upset. But I’ve played worst games. Overall, this is a good game and you should download it. ❤️🙂
Thank you,
A happy consumer

title: Pretty Cool
text: I like this game a lot I think the update needs a few changes but overall this game is really fun to play. There are a few things I would change tho. First of all I don’t like how all the characters are really expensive I only have 10k and I can afford is a robot. I think you should make the characters be less expensive. Also I think that you should make that police officer that chases you I little bit more faster. The update looks a lot like a kid just made it. I personal like the game without the update. But I have also been playing for a long time. Also I think you should have more boasts because the ones that you have are a little bit boring and don’t go on for that long. But I do love that you get faster when you stay alive for longer. As you can see there needs some change shut I would recommend this game. If you are reading this I hope I’m not being to bossy with what I’m saying. But c’mon the game need some changes.

title: Classic awesome game
text: This game offers a wide variety of fun options you can try. You can surf on different boards, and the longer you surf for while avoiding obstacles, the more characters you unlock. This is a game that I would recommend to anyone. There are different obstacles, maps, characters, boards, events, mystery boxes, and even the music you hear while playing that you can get and change. The game is very easy to play, but you will not get bored of it. There are many events and challenges. This game is so fun and I have always enjoyed it. Also, there aren’t too many ads, and they are checked by the game to ensure safety of the players. Coins, keys and other items are usually not too difficult to earn. All in all, I highly recommend this game to anyone willing to give it a try. Thanks for reading my review, have a blessed and relaxing day.

title: I like most new stuff. (Since 3 years ago)
text:
I played Subway surfer from the very beginning until that horrid update about 3 years ago. I literally deleted the game after 1 run. Recently I got bored and decided to try out the new graphics. To my surprise the game is back to normal and has even added new challenges which I like. Mystery hurdles is my favorite even though I’ve yet to get the top prize. I love that I can see more characters and boards at the same time and can mark favorites.

  I dislike Frizzy’s name change and that “Ella as a nickname for elephant” crap used to explain why. You could have just stuck to “Ella after Ella Fitzgerald”. I’m guessing you changed the name to not be offensive but that “Rasta” outfit is the most offensive thing about any of the characters. I also dislike being able to obtain so many tokens while the prizes they’re for take days to unlock. Might as well go back to the weekly hunt style if we can’t get prizes once we can afford them.

title: omg i am addicted.
text:
i’ll be honest at first, i downloaded this game because all of my friends had it and i wanted to make fun of it. but now after only 3 days of playing it, i realize that this is FOR SURE my favorite game on my phone. and that’s saying something since i have multiple games that i love. this game is a fun game for children any age to play!! i love going on every 8 hours just pulling out my phone, calling a friend, and literally saying: “hey. u got subway surfers cause if so.. PFFT we gotta play it.” (fun fact: all of them agreed w/ me it’s their favorite app)

this app is great for kids/teens who love games where you can earn something or level up for doing something!! the character choices are amazing and i love that you can change the entire outfit instead of just the color!! i strongly recommend this game if you are as bored as i am on these quarantine days 😀

title: Pretty Good!
text: I’ve had a lot of experience with Subway Surfers. I haven’t got any bugs or problems. I’ve been playing since I was about six. I think this game is a good way to pass time. I’m sick right now, and I’m home alone, I have nothing to do, so that’s an example to pass time. Me and my brothers have been competing against each other. This gets to my point, the leaderboard is very helpful because you can see other player’s score and compete against each other.  It’s also cool how you can compete in contests kind of and get prizes. I feel like the keys are too expensive to buy with cash, same with keys, you can use ads for coins and keys, which makes up for that. When you spend about a key so you don’t die, it’s like you didn’t spend it because usually I get keys in mystery boxes and in achievements. Overall, I think the game is very fun and addicting! I will be playing a lot more in the future!! :D

title: Weird glitch??
text: So it’s currently the Greece map, and one day when I was playing the game was being super laggy and constantly freezing so I closed it. then, several hours later when I opened it again, it was giving me the tutorial again??? and I was playing as jake??????? After I did the tutorial and looked at my characters, they were gone?? all of the characters and hoverboards I had collected were gone. my highscore and all of the items I had collected were still there, but all of my characters and hoverboards were gone. the craziest part is, I had gotten the cobra hoverboard from the Greece event. and it says I collected it, it had a check mark on the list of things you can collect from the Greek trophies. but when I go to my hoverboards, it just says “view”. So it’s gone, but because I already collected it I can’t get it again. PLEASE HELP!!! or at least tell me what happened, because I’m super confused 😭

title: Awsome Sauce!!!
text:
I’ve been playing since 2017, and this game has drawn me back every time. It’s super fun, but I wish the graphics when the characters bump in to something were a little more realistic, instead of just circles and stars. 
With that said, I don’t want to bail on Subway Surfers. It’s still a really fun game. It’s super tempting to buy characters with actual money, and they advertise a lot, so it kind of distracts from the game, though. Prize boxes are alway follow by a video advertising some other game I’m assuming is going to soon be in competition with Subway Surfers. It’s like they want to set up a rivalry. Which is good for business, because then there are two major games, but at the same time, advertising costs money and cost means deduction, and we haven’t even gotten in to how much they’re going to have to pay their character artists to keep renewing the drawings.
Even still, GET THIS GAME. I BEG OF YOU. GET IT. NOW!!!

title: Absolutely GREAT game, but i have something that would make it super duper great
text: hi, i’ve been playing subway surfers since i was 7 years old, and i absolutely love it. i love collecting the characters and getting new hoverboards and stuff like that. but there’s one thing i think would make this the greatest game ever. what if you could make your own customized character, i feel that would boost the games ratings drastically. my mom also wanted me to choose different characters than the ones that i actually liked, and she was like where’s your character, and i told her that wasn’t a thing that you could do, and that’s where this idea came from. if you do go through with this, could you make gender neutral characters and lots of poc hair styles. y’all don’t have to do this, but this would be a super cool thing if you could do this, and maybe also do boards, or maybe even just the boards.

title: Great game overall
text:
I have been playing this game for a long time now and it is really fun but there are a few things I don’t like about it. If you’ve ever tried to complete the achievements for no jumping or rolling, you can’t use a hover board because it restarts your progress and counts it as a jump if you crash. therefore you have to either sit there watching annoying ads every five seconds or spend a lot of keys. I probably lost over 30 keys just trying to skip the ads in one run and I didn’t even get the achievement
It also costs a lot of coins for power ups just to get a head start or boost. It doesn’t seem like too much to get one or two of them but it can deplete your coins really fast 
I also was playing once and had a really high score and over 20,000 coins but when I came back to the game it had restarted and I lost all that progress
Otherwise, love the game overall

title: THE BEST
text:
This game is so fun and amusing. You can get new skins, and boards, by collecting items. Also you can get higher and higher in races, you would have so so much fun!!!!!!!!!!!
I should know I’ve been playing this game for 7 years!!!!!!! You can get coins while your running and you can collect mystery boxes with things like coins, boards, items to unlock things, and keys. The keys are for when you hit something you can use them to keep going and sometimes you can just watch an add if you don’t have enough keys. You can use coins to by stuff. While your running you can collect letters that spell into the weekly word then you get a mystery box when you collect all the letters. Also this game is really fun so you would really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really want to download this game,      it’s super fun.😋😛😝😜😊😁😄😃😀😎☺️😅👍🏻👌👍🏻👌
